resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4798</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Evaporazione</string>
            <string language="en">Evaporation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdampfung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évaporation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evaporação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξάτμιση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evaporación</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">All'interno del fenomeno delle piante, l'evaporazione gioca un ruolo importante. Consideriamo quale meccanismo consente l'evaporazione controllata e come i fattori esterni condizionino il livello di evaporazione.</string>
            <string language="en">Within the phenomenon of vegetables the evaporation plays an important role. Let’s consider, which mechanism enables the controlled evaporation and how foreign factors affect the extent of evaporation</string>
          </description>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Innerhalb des Phänomenes des Gemüses spielt die 
Verdampfung eine wichtige Rolle. Let?s betrachten, dem Einheit 
die kontrollierte Verdampfung aktiviert und wie fremde Faktoren den 
Umfang einer Verdampfung beeinflussen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans le phénomène des légumes l'évaporation 
joue un rôle important. Let?s considèrent, que le mécanisme 
permet l'évaporation commandée et comment des facteurs étrangers 
affectent l'ampleur de l'évaporation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dentro do fenômeno dos vegetais a evaporação 
joga um papel importante. Let?s consideram, que o mecanismo 
permite a evaporação controlada e como fatores extrangeiros afeta a 
extensão da evaporação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσα στο φαινόμενο των λαχανικών τα παιχνίδια 
εξάτμισης ένας σημαντικός ρόλος. Το Let?s εξετάζει, 
ποιος μηχανισμός επιτρέπει την ελεγχόμενη εξάτμιση και πώς οι 
ξένοι παράγοντες έχουν επιπτώσεις στην έκταση της εξάτμισης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dentro del fenómeno de vehículos la evaporación
desempeña un papel importante. Let?s consideran, que el 
mecanismo permite la evaporación controlada y cómo los factores no 
nativos afecta el fragmento de la evaporación</string>
          </description>
        </general>
